original: Lindkvist, Erik Holger, rektor, [-]öii-köping,-] {+]öii- köping,+} f. 3/7/09 i Åmål av John L. o. Maria Finnman. G. 37 m. Elisabeth (Anna-Lisa) Vätterstam. Barn: Per-Olov f. 41, Peter 43. — Stud:ex. 29, fil. ämb:ex. v. Gbgs högsk. 36, provår 43-44. Tjg. v. ol. lärov., e. o. ämneslär. v. Dalslands folkhögsk. i Färgelanda 39-43, rektor v. Södra V"^ät-terbygd. folkhögsk. i Jönköp. fr. 44. Ordf. i fria kristl. gymnas :rör. 39, led. av styr. f. förb. f. kristet samhällsliv fr. 41, ordf. i ungd:förb. f. kristet samhällsliv 42-45. Red. f. Gymnasist-bladet 37-38, f. tidskr. Länkom fr. 45.
translated: Lindkvist, Erik Holger, principal, born 3/7/09 in Åmål to John L. and Maria Finnman. Married in 1937 to Elisabeth (Anna-Lisa) Vätterstam. Children: Per-Olov born in 1941, Peter in 1943. Completed high school exams in 1929, graduated with a Bachelor of Arts degree from the University of Gothenburg in 1936, and completed a probationary year from 1943-1944. Worked as a temporary teacher at various schools and as a substitute subject teacher at Dalslands Folk High School in Färgelanda from 1939-1943. Became principal of Södra Vätterbygd Folk High School in Jönköping from 1944. Served as president of the Free Christian Gymnasium Association from 1939, member of the board for the Association for Christian Social Life from 1941, and president of the Young Association for Christian Social Life from 1942-1945. Was the editor of Gymnasist-Bladet from 1937-1938 and of the magazine Länkom from 1945 onwards.

memberOf.name: Young Association for Christian Social Life
